name: Mr. Zoomie's Escape
description:
Mr. Zoomie's Escape - A platformer where you take on the role of Mr. Zoomie the Cat to escape after he is kidnapped by a mysterious figure. This was a submission in the 37th GMC Game Jam by Team Zoom, Orlando J. Hernandez, Jr. and Priscilla Marie Acosta!

This was our first game jam as well as the first time making a "substantial game." It was quite the experience and we learned a lot and had a great time making it, even if the scope had to shrink a bit!
